step.cmd: Check your email inbox for a reciept of payment from AirClassroom
Scroll past the receipt portion of the email
step.stepresult: Your one-time room activation code is listed below the receipt portion of the email.

step.cmd: At the keypad, punch in the numbers as listed on the email, then press enter.
step.info: Your keycode will be allow you to access the space 15 minutes before and after your rental time.
